children.text:
Thanks for downloading Multiplication Memorizer!

 Multiplication Memorizer helps you memorize multiplication facts (up to the 12 Ã— 12 times table).

 There are 5 main areas:
 1. Times Tables
 2. Quick Start
 3. Time Trials
 4. Time Records
 5. Data

 1. Times Tables
 - Displays all the multiplication facts, a "row" at a time
 - Learn at your own pace, toggling answers on/off
 - Navigate through rows using the table menu or by swiping
 - Pressing the PRACTICE button will allow you to practice only the facts of that row

 2. Quick Start
 - Takes you straight to the Practice Area
 - Gives 12 (default) or 24 randomly generated questions at a time
 - Results are saved and can be viewed in the Data Area

 3. Time Trials
 - Is the place where you can compete for the fastest times around the world
 - Gives 12 randomly generated questions for a given problem set
 - Gives a 2 second time penalty for each incorrect answer
 - Times are saved only if there are 2 or less incorrect answers
 - The top 10 times, for each set, can be viewed in the Time Records area
 - If signed in to your account, and if there are 2 or less incorrect answers, your times will be uploaded to the Leaderboards
 - Results are saved and can be viewed in the Data Area

 4. Time Records
 - Keeps track of the 10 fastest times for each row
 - Displays the rank, user initials, completion time, and date for each record

 5. Data
 - Displays results from practice and time trials sessions
 - For each multiplication fact, displays:
 	- Total questions answered correctly
 	- Total questions attempted
 	- Percentage answered correctly
 	- Grade (based on percentage answered correctly)
 - Cells display a color for each fact, indicating percent correct and grade:
